https://www.foody.vn/quang-ninh/dai-long.user_titlec: A VERY NICE RESTAURANT & BEAUTIFUL COFFEE GARDEN!!
https://www.foody.vn/quang-ninh/dai-long.user_comment:
I have been there twice and I fell in love with that place. Its easy to find the beautiful white building with its classy old architecture style. It has a garden around the entrance where you can have a coffee or smoothie. Upstairs are seperate dining rooms with fancy interior design, where you can enjoy your dinner. 
The food is very good, seafood (its so fresh, they have basins with alive fish, prawns, squids and more!) and beef. The selection is good but it took sometimes a bit until the dishes got served. 
The staff though is very friendly and helpful. 
Always worth a visit, day or night!
Honestly awesome!!!

https://www.foody.vn/quang-ninh/dai-long.user_titlec: Very nice restaurant! Worth a visit!
https://www.foody.vn/quang-ninh/dai-long.user_comment:
Everbody can get a own room for dinner, with great and friendly service. Seafood is amazing just as beef or anything else.
The building is  in a fancy looking style of the last century, but it is new and has a nice garden!
